Title: Creates a racing fan advisory board, establishing an I Love NY Racing promotion and awarding the New York State Horse Racing Farm of the Year Award
Summary: Relates to creating a racing fan advisory board to provide advice to the state racing and wagering board on issues related to horse racing and wagering; establishes an I Love NY Racing promotion and the New York State Horse Racing Farm of the Year Award.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Add ยง912, RWB L; amd ยง100, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the economic development law, in relation to creating a racing fan advisory board and establishing an I Love NY Racing promotion
